name: Spencer Hardwick
summary: Platform Product Manager operating at Senior/Staff PM scope with 7+ years of experience building enterprise-scale infrastructure, CI/CD systems, and data platforms. Proven success driving cross-functional product strategy, reducing deployment errors by 95%, and supporting $5.1B+ in inventory across 500M+ transactions annually. Expert in API design, observability, automation, and platform reliability. Adept at leading infrastructure initiatives from concept to production at global scale.
